title: What Would Demacia Imprison?
body:
By now, I think we've all seen this image on one of Riot's upcoming champions:

https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/Roadmap_5-min_ewvawswx1f9gms6lnslj.jpg

Polished grey stone, hints of sweeping architecture, and thick, bold, yet elegantly curved golden chains hint strong at Demacia. And what might Demacian imprison? Well, something powerfully magical, no doubt -- their prisons would be naturally well-suited to it. Something possibly with hooves, as, if you look closely, you'll see legs in the image that don't appear to end in normal feet.

Thoughts? What sort of dread beastie do you think might be lurking just out of sight?

Ever since I saw this teaser I have been perplexed.

Compiling Theories and Observations:

As you guys have noted, to me it looks mostly Demacian, but it could also be another nation.

Bandle City, The Shadow Isles, and Demacia are probably next in line for lore updates.

The large influx of mages in recent times may lead to this being an AD champion (though who knows)?

We already have a chain warden (thresh) so that small niche is taken up, though a prisoner would be neat.

Could possibly be a vastaya or a beast of some sorts, or even someone wearing an odd form of clothing for being imprisoned.

Speculation aside, part of me hopes this Champion is connected to the Shadow Isles in a way, since I am a big fan of that region. However, most of the information we know points to Demacia.

Anyways, we will need to just keep an eye out for more information, and keep theorizing!
